home.intro_line_1: My name is { Ramiro Mazzucco Giusseppin },

presentation_letter.title: About me
presentation_letter.text_line_1: Welcome and thank you for visit my web site.
presentation_letter.text_line_2: My name is Ramiro but everyone call´s me 'Rama'. I use to programming since 3 years. I developing web and movile aplications since then, with angular, ionic and node. I´m also use to develop of APIs with node, nestjs and express in lesser extent, although my orientation is towards to frontend than to backend.
presentation_letter.text_line_3: Fortunately I found something to dedicate myself to with pleasure, but it was not always like this...
